mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.group_name AS solutionGroupName, t3.realname AS solutionUserName, t4.reason_code AS faultReasonCode, t5.solution_code AS faultSolutionCode FROM bu_fault_handle_record t1 LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t2 ON t2.id = t1.solution_group_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.id = t1.solution_user_id LEFT JOIN bu_fault_reason t4 ON t4.id = t1.fault_reason_id LEFT JOIN bu_fault_solution t5 ON t5.id = t1.fault_solution_id WHERE t1.fault_info_id = #{id} ORDER BY t1.solution_time DESC
mapper.sql: id, category_id, fault_code_id, fault_sn, fault_desc, sys_id, sub_sys_id, fault_asset_id, happen_time, work_order_id, order_task_id, line_id, train_no, phase, fault_level, f_online, has_duty, outsource, report_group_id, report_user_id, report_time, duty_engineer, status, close_user_id, close_time, submit_status, work_station_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, create_type, train_structure_id, handle_status, handle_order_id, out_supplier_id, form_value_id, plan_id, company_id, workshop_id, track_message, from_type
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t1.line_name AS lineName, t2.name AS sysName, t3.name AS faultAssetName, t4.group_name AS reportGroupName, t5.name AS subSysName, t6.category_code as categoryCode, t7.flt_code as faultCodeCode, t8.name as outSupplierName, t9.plan_name, NVL(t10.process_status, '未发起') AS wfStatus, t10.process_candidate FROM bu_fault_info t LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_line t1 ON t1.line_id = t.line_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_asset_type t2 ON t2.id = t.sys_id LEFT JOIN bu_maximo_train_asset t3 ON t3.id = t.fault_asset_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t4 ON t4.id = t.report_group_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_asset_type t5 ON t5.id = t.sub_sys_id LEFT JOIN bu_fault_category t6 ON t6.id = t.category_id LEFT JOIN bu_fault_code_new t7 ON t7.flt_code = t.fault_code_id LEFT JOIN bu_base_supplier t8 ON t8.id = t.out_supplier_id LEFT JOIN bu_repair_plan t9 ON t9.id = t.plan_id LEFT JOIN wf_biz_status t10 ON t10.business_key = t.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT temp.* from (SELECT t.id, t.fault_desc, t1.group_name AS reportGroupName, t.report_time, t2.name AS sysName, t.status, t3.name AS workstationName, t3.station_no AS workstationNo, NVL(t4.process_status, '未发起') AS wfStatus, t4.process_candidate FROM bu_fault_info t LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t1 ON t1.id = t.report_group_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_asset_type t2 ON t2.id = t.sys_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workstation t3 ON t3.id = t.work_station_id LEFT JOIN wf_biz_status t4 ON t4.business_key = t.id WHERE t.workshop_id = #{workshopId} ORDER BY t.report_time DESC) temp where rowNum = #{num}
select t.id, t.work_order_id, '' as faultAssetTypeId from bu_fault_info t left join bu_maximo_train_asset t1 on t1.id = t.fault_asset_id where t.plan_id = #{planId}

select t.reason_desc as "reasonDesc", count(t.reason_desc) as "count" from bu_fault_handle_record t left join bu_fault_info t1 on t1.id = t.fault_info_id left join bu_repair_plan t2 on t2.id = t1.plan_id where t2.repair_program_id = #{repairProgramId} group by t.reason_desc
